title: Understanding Personal Information and Privacy Settings in MyPack Portal
shortdesc: Explore the structure and significance of managing personal, academic, and financial information through NC State's MyPack Portal.

conbody.p: NC State Unity account holders can access and manage their personal, academic, and financial information securely through the MyPack Portal. Maintaining this information securely is essential for safeguarding privacy.

section.title: Types of Personal Information Managed
section.p: Various categories of personal information are manageable within the MyPack Portal, each serving a crucial role:

ul.li: Personal Details: Including student ID number, name, and preferred name, essential for identity verification and service personalization.
Contact Details: Email addresses and phone numbers, vital for effective communication with the university and peers.
Privacy Restrictions: Settings under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA), enabling control over the visibility of information.

section.title: Importance of Privacy and Security
section.p: Effective management of your information within MyPack Portal ensures protection of personal details and prevents unauthorized access, thereby enhancing security within the university environment.
